task.title: Preparing and Managing Vehicle Gasoline Tank
task.shortdesc: Safety procedures and maintenance guidelines for filling and managing the vehicle's gasoline tank.

taskbody.prereq: Ensure a safe working environment free from open flames:

step.cmd: Fill gasoline tank to nearly full capacity (ten gallons)
step.stepxmp: Maintain fuel level to prevent running low

substep.cmd: Keep flames away from tank during filling.
Avoid lighting matches near spilled gasoline.

step.stepresult: Ensure vent hole remains unobstructed for proper fuel flow.

taskbody.result: Safely prepared gasoline tank with proper fuel management.

ul.li: Drain tank using sediment bulb pet cock if necessary.
Be aware of explosive vapor risks.
